About Me

Hello there, my name is Jennifer. I'm currently in 3rd year of my computer science degree and I am hoping to pursue a career in web development. Right now i'm always trying to keep myself up to date with the latest technologies. By applying this newfound knowledge to my future projects, I aim to make the web a better place.
